name: Mays Business School Consulting Club
description:
Our Vision:

To provide an educational and networking platform for Mays Business School students interested in pursuing or continuing a career in consulting.

 

Our Mission: 

The mission of the MBSCC is to provide its members with the opportunity to interact with top consulting firms, both in the U.S. and abroad. The MBSCC will also arrange various networking events to enable students to meet with the consultants in an informal atmosphere and provide them with a better understanding of the industry. Additionally, the MBSCC will help its members acquire the skills and knowledge necessary to succeed in the consulting recruiting and interview process.

 

Our Goals: 

  1. Increase student placement at consulting firms following graduation from Texas A&M;
  2. Increase the number of consulting firms that recruit on campus at Texas A&M;
  3. Create a networking platform for MBA and graduate students;
  4. Conduct case interview preparation sessions;
  5. Provide students with information about business, the consulting industry, and related careers.
summary: Our Vision is to provide an educational and networking platform for Mays Business School students interested in pursuing or continuing a career in consulting.
